name: Scaaaary Gaaaame
description:
This game is the first horror game I made. so it's not scary. The game may be more scary in new upcoming updates soon. The game has no purpose. you can only collect brown points. but do not collect the red points and not step on black places. There are 3 different jumpscare in this game. Jumpscares aren't so scary, but they'll be scarier soon. Bugs in the first version of this game will be fixed soon

In version 0.3 of the game, all bugs have been fixed (including not jumping). The game is now playable.

What's new in version 0.3 of the game:
  • menu edits
  • jump bug fix
  • random powerup boxes (fly bug caused by these boxes will be fixed in 0.4)
Features that can be found in random powerup boxes:
  • acceleration
  • slowdown
  • disable jumping
  • disable zoom
  • unlimited running
  • increase score by 1
  • boost score randomly
  • random jumpscare
